channel.title: Blogs on Coding and Math Classes and Tutoring in Charlottesville
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Coding and Math Classes and Tutoring in Charlottesville

item.title: Summer camp
item.description: Summer Coding and Math Camps Join us for summer camps for students 6 to 10 years old from 9 am to 1 pm from July 24th to August 29th, July 31st to August 4th, and August 7th to August 11th! Register By: July 15th, 2023. Capacity: 6 students. Cost: $300 per student.

item.title: Summer Break
item.description: Summer Break Blue Ridge Boost will be closed from June 5th to July 23rd. However, online classes are available in June and July! The regular schedule resumes on July 24th.

item.title: Free trial coding classes
item.description: Free Trial Coding Classes Open house every Sunday at 1 pm! Come in to see the space and meet the instructor! Bring in your child for demo sessions.

item.title: New Location in Downtown Charlottesville
item.description: The new office is ready for students!

item.title: New Location in Downtown Charlottesville
item.description: New Downtown Location Starting in September, Blue Ridge Boost is located at 222 Court Square, Charlottesville. To reach us, please walk around to the back of the building. Walk up the stairs to the second floor and enter through the door on your left. The closest paid parking is the Market Street Garage. Free 2-hour parking is available throughout the Downtown area.
